short_description: Precision Health Guardian: Your reptile pets are very sensitive to temperature and humidity, and small changes can affect their comfort and even their health. This humidity thermometer utilizes a built-in high-precision measurement chip that monitors the environment with 0.9°F accuracy, ensuring you are always aware of the actual conditions in your animal's tank. It's not just a matter of caring, it's a consideration for your pet's long-term health.

Comprehensive Monitoring Experience: With the purchase of this kit, you will receive two humidity thermometers that can monitor multiple areas of your reptile tank or multiple containers at the same time. This gives you a more comprehensive view and control over the environmental status of your entire ecosystem without having to invest in additional monitoring equipment.

Easy to Read and Operate: The LED screen clearly displays the temperature, making it easy to read, day or night, even in dimly lit rooms. In addition, the simple design of the quick switching function between ℉ and ℃ makes it easy for users with different habits to use and adjust according to their needs.

Easy to Install: With the help of the included double-sided adhesive, you can fix the humidity thermometer in any ideal position in seconds without complicated tools or tedious steps. The cordless design avoids cumbersome wiring and keeps your animal tank environment neat and undisturbed.

Energy Efficient and Reliable: This product supports replacement battery power, eliminating the financial burden and waste of resources that comes with frequently purchasing new equipment. Meanwhile, the durable construction and design ensure the long-term stable operation of the product, which is more friendly and economical than other single-use products.

name: SunGrow Reptile Digital Thermometer Terrarium Temperature Monitor with Suction Cup Mount, Accurate Fahrenheit Celsius Switch, Thermostat Gauge for Bearded Dragon, Snake, Gecko Enclosure Tank
short_description: Maintain Ideal Temperature in Reptile’s Habitat --- While caring for your beloved reppies, temperature plays a quintessential role. Their tank temperature must not be so high to cause overheating. It shouldn’t also be too low as it may affect digestion. If unable to properly digest food, reptiles can be very sluggish and lethargic. Reptile Digital Thermometer by SunGrow allows you to closely monitor the right temperature to keep them in optimal condition.

Accurate Temperature --- Cold-blooded animals like reptiles regulate their body temperature from external sources. It is important for a bearded dragon should be kept in an enclosure that can replicate the temperature it receives in their original habitat. Our gadget effectively gives precise measurements to help them feel comfortable in their new home.

Easy to Read, Install, & Operate --- This gadget features a digital screen that displays reading in both Fahrenheit and Celsius. It provides temperature measurement in decimal points and is easier to read than its mercury counterpart. To use, just open the battery cover and insert the LR44 button cell batteries (not included) with (+) positive side up. The pack also includes suction cups to help you conveniently attach it outside the terrarium.

With Remote Sensor Probe --- This monitoring equipment has a water-resilient remote sensor probe which enables you to check temperature in both dry and wet substrates. Please note that the display unit should not be submerged as only the sensor is impervious to water.

Compact & Aesthetically Pleasing --- With a size of only 1.5” x 2.3” x 0.5”, this can be displayed anywhere in your tank without getting in the way of your pal’s view. The 39” long white wire helps in making it discreet. Stylish in its yellow color, it also adds to the positive vibes of the surroundings.
